html:
7.2.20  9:17 pm   What could be a motivation to be an artist?

      anything that could ever happen

7.2.20  8:46 pm   i just heard about u doin a new vid...

      hm, the problem with that is the number of videos seems way too low for me

7.2.20  8:38 pm   what is real and what is fake?

      find out if something is real by tapping it gently. log the results in a notebook. this has nothing to do with whether it's real, but it's fun. everything is real

7.2.20  8:19 pm   I want to build a rocket ship but I don't know where to start 

      there's got to be some tutorials online

7.2.20  8:03 pm   what's the best way to be the best?

      be pretty good

7.2.20  7:58 pm   i feel like my goal is impossible. what do i do

      make a documentary about figuring out how to do it

7.2.20  7:07 pm   is silence music?

      only when used together somehow with non-silence

7.2.20  6:24 pm   how do you coup with bad things

      start coming up with what you really think a good thing should be

7.2.20  5:12 pm   What is your opinion on birds 

      it's got to be the female version of a bee

7.2.20  4:43 pm   Do you like music theory? Or try to ignore?

      can always make more

7.2.20  4:27 pm   what is your opinion on the way the earth works?

      sometimes it reminds me of a unicycle, and the Unicycle way of thinking. "Sure, this is probably easier with 2 wheels, but, can you do it with 1"

7.2.20  3:35 pm   How do you decide on what chords to use?

      it's mostly obvious right away, but then might go in and refine if necessary until i can get it as close as possible to that feeling of inventing the whole universe for the first time again and again

7.2.20  3:25 pm   what are your feelings about goldfish?

      is it a pet? is it a snack? check the packaging because there's 2 types

7.2.20  3:11 pm   I feel stuck when I make an interesting musical sound but I don't know what to do with it, any advice?

      try using it to explain the nature of the world around us

7.2.20  3:06 pm   did you make it to the south pole?

      i sent a text

7.2.20  2:46 pm   why do ducks quack

      to prove they exist

7.2.20  1:48 pm   Ever thought about making a machine?

      yes

7.2.20  1:28 pm   What is pizza?

      a gift either from the lord or to the lord. but which one, it's not clear to me

7.2.20  1:06 pm   how do you music?

      it's really just different combinations of 1 and 2

7.2.20  1:00 pm   What world record should I break?

      furthest into the world

7.2.20  12:53 pm   A lot of people are saying you have your own genre of music so you consider that to be true?

      seems like a good starting place. a jumping off point. a sort of home base if you will

7.2.20  12:22 pm   Your songs are very very motivational, especially 'Just did a bad thing' something about it just pushes me to try and write songs. But i'm not too good at discovering lyrics, what do you think?

      anything is a lyric. you can use music to prove it. and, another thing, this is off the subject, but it also works the other way around

7.2.20  12:12 pm   i struggle to write songs, id just fool around on my bass and be like heh. this soudns cool. but id just be playing a riff in one key for 4 bars then play it in another key (usually a fourth above) for another 4 bars and thats it. the songs suck. how do you like... expand on this? like do jazzy stuff - or at least something interesting and somewhat memorable

      use it to communicate what shape you think the world is. you are allowed to use words if necessary, and chords also, if necessary. which may or may not require using some other instruments as well. bass is not necessarily in its natural habitat when it's alone.....

7.2.20  11:22 am   do you ever sleep these questions are 24/7

      yes, they are asked while i sleep

7.2.20  11:19 am   What is the best way to learn something?

      fall in love with it

7.2.20  10:38 am   Do you remember the day we pretended to be every star in the sky?

      that reminds me of something that would be in the future

7.2.20  10:12 am   are you gonna post new videos?

      yes

7.2.20  9:12 am   What is your opinion on sponges?

      i can never figure out how big they really are

7.2.20  8:19 am   what was the bad thing you did when you were making "i did a bad thing"?

      when making the song selection, i narrowed it down to my finalists list and then immediately went around for a second round of elimination, hoping to get like an ultra-finalists list. This was a terrible mistake because i ended up eliminating them all. so to get revenge on myself i uneliminated that whole round and then picked the worst one on purpose, which was just 1 line at the time

7.2.20  7:28 am   opinions on cereal

      it's a good way to test if a bowl works

7.2.20  6:48 am   How do I stop being scared of the dark?

      spend more time in the dark

7.2.20  6:05 am   Does normality even exist?

      yes. it's like that friend you didn't even know you had

7.2.20  5:53 am   what was the bad thing you did in "I just did a bad thing"?

      attempted to add non-songs into the 2 week song schedule without reducing the song schedule, and in the process failed at adding the non-song and failed at not ruining the 2 week song schedule

7.2.20  5:22 am   why visual effects make things real?

      seeing stuff, helps you figure out what's real

7.2.20  5:18 am   (forgive if been asked already) what was the bad thing you did in 'Just Did A Bad Thing'?

      failed to complete the video by the time the song hit the music stores. so it made for an awkwardly timed release

7.2.20  5:07 am   What should you do when it feels everything is stacked against you?

      rotate the stack

7.2.20  5:04 am   how to get good at singing?

      try improvising the lyrics. that will trick your brain into thinking this is your main form of communication

7.2.20  4:21 am   how to be awesome

      instead of saying 'peanuts', start saying 'peanits'

7.2.20  4:19 am   What originally inspired you to make music?

      music

7.2.20  4:07 am   thoughts on pineapple on pizza?

      i'll give you a hint, pineapple goes very well with sandals and pizza goes well with socks

7.2.20  4:02 am   What's your opinion on bowling?

      no bowl involved. it's actually a ball. should be called balling

7.2.20  3:36 am   Why can't I fall asleep?

      because you'd rather invent something

7.2.20  3:19 am   What is art?

      could be you

7.2.20  2:54 am   Will you talk about Velcro soon

      hopefully demonstrate it, first hand

7.2.20  2:41 am   what should i draw

      the world you know or have imagined

7.2.20  2:09 am   when you perform live, what will be your entrance music when you walk out onstage?

      the first song

7.2.20  1:40 am   why can't i sleep?

      because the world is too interesting

7.2.20  1:36 am   Why do you want to go outside?

      to be in the sky, pretty much

7.2.20  1:16 am   do you think we will ever find other intelligent life?

      if only we could even find each other

7.2.20  1:06 am   how is the stock market system set up in such a way for Elon Musk to tweet 'tesla stocks are too high imo' and they immediately fall? Are the stockholders so superstitious that they immediatly sell all their stocks at the mere hint of a droop? its bamboozling me how the CEO has so much power. 

     it's like growing corn. sometimes a bit of reverse psychology can do just the trick
